name: Farm & Ranch FR110-2 Steel Utility Cart with Removable Folding Sides, 400-lb Capacity

reviews.name: Farm & Ranch FR110-2 Steel Utility Cart with Removable Folding Sides, 400-lb Capacity
reviews.reviewText: I love this wagon. It was simple to assemble and it moves well over all terrain.
reviews.title: 26 January 2013

reviews.name: Farm & Ranch FR110-2 Steel Utility Cart with Removable Folding Sides, 400-lb Capacity
reviews.reviewText: This cart is just the right size for me. I live in an apartment with a fairly long walk to the parking lot. This cart makes it easy to bring in groceries, bottled water, pop, etc. and still does not take a lot of room between uses. The pneumatic tires roll easy. It was not hard to put together.
reviews.title: Very helpfull

reviews.name: Farm & Ranch FR110-2 Steel Utility Cart with Removable Folding Sides, 400-lb Capacity
reviews.reviewText: My cart has many uses and that is why I purchased it. I live in Indianapolis, In. but I am from Los Angeles, California where public transportation is more rapid. I do not own a car and the laundry mat and grocery stores are in walking distance but not for carrying a lot of heavy bags. I use my cart for grocery shopping, laundry, and basic carrying needs. The public loves it! Where ever I go strangers say, "That is a good idea!" They call it my "adult wagon"! I say, "I got this from Wall Mart and I love it! I get great exercise walking and my adult son gets a kick out of sitting in it! (He thinks I will pull him in it like when he was a kid! (big smile)). I could if I wanted to because it has a 400 lb capacity and is very sturdy. I literally have people double take their looks when I strut on by with my sassy walk pulling my wagon! This has been my best purchase so far this year. The one suggestion I do have is making the instructions on how to put it together easier to understand or have an accurate assembly tutorial "you tube" video for it. Other than that, I am very satisfied with my "adult wagon!"
reviews.title: Great for many uses

reviews.name: Farm & Ranch FR110-2 Steel Utility Cart with Removable Folding Sides, 400-lb Capacity
reviews.reviewText:
this wagon is easy to put together the nuts and bolts are
packaged in sequence for the buld of it
istuctions easy to read i had mine together in thirty minnets
the nice fat tires keep the wheels from digging in the dirt like the skinny solid wheels do under heavey loads
reviews.title: good strong construction

reviews.name: Farm & Ranch FR110-2 Steel Utility Cart with Removable Folding Sides, 400-lb Capacity
reviews.reviewText: I use this cart to load all my fishing gears ( buckets, cooler, folding chairs etc.) serves the purpose, made everything easy for me & the product came earlier than expected.
reviews.title: perfect for the purpose
